category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSEOccNotesNoCopy
preference.preference_description: Determines which occurrence notes are not copied when users copy and paste a PSOccurrence. You can set this behavior on a run-time basis by specifying it to be a user preference or retain the value between sessions by making it a site preference. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid occurrence note.
